column4: Q1 Q1: First I would like to ask you about your current situation / family situation. How would you rate it on a scale from 1 to 5?
Q2 Q2: In general, what do you think about the current situation in Yemen, is it going in the right direction or in the wrong direction?

column8: To some extent in the right direction
column10: Not in the right direction, not in the wrong direction
column12: To some extent in a bad direction
